verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4150><s%>, The set feasts of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which ye shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations <S%H4744><s%>, even these are my set feasts <S%H4150><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%>: but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of solemn rest <S%H7677><s%>, a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no manner of work <S%H4399><s%>: it is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.
These are the set feasts <S%H4150><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, even holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations <S%H4744><s%>, which ye shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> in their appointed season <S%H4150><s%>.
In the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day of the month at even <S%H6153><s%>, is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s passover <S%H6453><s%>.

And on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>.
In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.

But ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, When ye are come into the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> unto you <S%H7114><s%>, and shall reap the harvest <S%H7105><s%> thereof <S%H935><s%>, then ye shall bring the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the first-fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your harvest <S%H7105><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>:

and he shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to be accepted <S%H7522><s%> for you <S%H4283><s%>: on the morrow after the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave it <S%H5130><s%>.

And in the day <S%H3117><s%> when ye wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%>, ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a he-lamb <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof shall be two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts of an ephah <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>; and the drink-offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof shall be of wine <S%H3196><s%>, the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%>.

And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> neither bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor parched grain <S%H7039><s%>, nor fresh ears <S%H3759><s%>, until this selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, until <S%H5704><s%> ye have brought <S%H935><s%> the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%>: it is a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

And ye shall count <S%H5608><s%> unto you from the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, from the day <S%H3117><s%> that ye brought <S%H935><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the wave-offering <S%H8573><s%>; seven <S%H7651><s%> sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> complete <S%H8549><s%>:

even unto <S%H5704><s%> the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the seventh <S%H7637><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> shall ye number <S%H5608><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Ye shall bring out <S%H935><s%> of your habitations <S%H4186><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wave <S%H8573><s%> - loaves <S%H3899><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts of an ephah <S%H6241><s%>: they shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, they shall be baken <S%H644><s%> with leaven <S%H2557><s%>, for first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And ye shall present <S%H7126><s%> with the bread <S%H3899><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H259><s%>, and one young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>: they shall be a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, with their meal-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>, even an offering <S%H4503><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> he-goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, with the two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>: they shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And ye shall make proclamation <S%H7121><s%> on the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>; there shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> unto you <S%H6213><s%>; ye shall do no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>: it is a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

And when ye reap <S%H7114><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%>, thou shalt not wholly <S%H3615><s%> reap <S%H7114><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of thy field <S%H7704><s%>, neither shalt thou gather <S%H3950><s%> the gleaning <S%H3951><s%> of thy harvest <S%H7105><s%>: thou shalt leave <S%H5800><s%> them for the poor <S%H6041><s%>, and for the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, shall be a solemn rest <S%H7677><s%> unto you <S%H2146><s%>, a memorial of blowing <S%H8643><s%> of trumpets <S%H6944><s%>, a holy convocation <S%H4744><s%>.
Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>; and ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Howbeit <S%H389><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%>: it shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> unto you <S%H6031><s%>, and ye shall afflict your souls <S%H5315><s%>; and ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no manner of work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>; for it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3725><s%> for you before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
For whatsoever soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that shall not be afflicted <S%H6031><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>; he shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And whatsoever soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that doeth <S%H6213><s%> any manner of work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> will I destroy <S%H6><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no manner of work <S%H4399><s%>: it is a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

It shall be unto you a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of solemn rest <S%H7677><s%>, and ye shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls <S%H5315><s%>: in the ninth <S%H8672><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, from even <S%H6153><s%> unto even <S%H6153><s%>, shall ye keep <S%H7673><s%> your sabbath <S%H7676><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, On the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> unto you <S%H7126><s%>; and ye shall offer an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it is a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.

These are the set feasts <S%H4150><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which ye shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations <S%H4744><s%>, to offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and a meal-offering <S%H5930><s%>, a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, and drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>, each <S%H1697><s%> on its own <S%H3117><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>;

besides the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and besides your gifts <S%H4979><s%>, and besides all your vows <S%H5088><s%>, and besides all your freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%>, which ye give <S%H5414><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Howbeit on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, when ye have gathered <S%H622><s%> in the fruits <S%H8393><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, ye shall keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn rest <S%H7677><s%>, and on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn rest <S%H7677><s%>.

And ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> you on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of goodly <S%H1926><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>, branches <S%H3709><s%> of palm-trees <S%H8558><s%>, and boughs <S%H6057><s%> of thick <S%H5687><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>, and willows <S%H6155><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%>; and ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And ye shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%>: it is a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>; ye shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.

Ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; all that are home-born <S%H249><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths <S%H5521><s%>;

that your generations <S%H1755><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths <S%H5521><s%>, when I brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> declared <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the set feasts <S%H4150><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
